IronRuby 0.3 for Silverlight
============================

http://sdlsdk.codeplex.com         - Dynamic Languages in Silverlight
http://github.com/jschementi/agdlr - Public source code repository.

Silverlight 2 
-------------
To use IronRuby 0.3 in Silverlight 2, use the binaries in the 2.0.40115.0 directory.

Silverlight 3
-------------
To use IronRuby 0.3 in Silverlight 3 Beta, use the binaries in the 3.0.40307.0 directory.

Usage
-----
For usage, see the wiki on http://sdlsdk.codeplex.com.
